channel.title: best-of-2014 - 333vinyl
channel.description: The name of this site is 333vinyl. That's what it's about.

item.title: 333vinyl Best Of 2014
item.description:
Ben Bailey's Top Albums

  1. Spoon - They Want My Soul
    An outstanding album from an outstandingly consistent band.
  2. St. Vincent - St. Vincent
    St. Vincent's best and bravest work yet.
  3. Flying Lotus - You're Dead!
    A future jazz masterpiece.
  4. Cloud Nothings - Here And Nowhere Else
    Even better and more concise than Attack On Memory.
  5. Iceage - Plowing Into The Field Of Love
    The post-punk band takes a dark western turn.
  6. The New Pornographers - Brill Bruisers
    The best New Pornographers album since Twin Cinema.
  7. TV On The Radio - Seeds
    A great comeback album from the band after their bassist died after the recording of Nine Types of Light.
  8. Parquet Courts - Content Nausea
    The second and better of two albums this band released this year. The title track is a standout, but the whole album is full of complex meditations on modern anxieties.
  9. Ought - More Than Any Other Day
    One of the most innovative new bands this year. The vocals and lyrics are Byrne-esque.
  10. The Antlers - Familiars
    Not quite as good as their previous two albums, Hospice and Burst Apart, but still a great album with an excellent vocal performance. Incorporates horns nicely.

Ben Bailey's Top Tracks

  1. "I'm Not Part of Me" - Cloud Nothings
  2. "I Wanna Get Better" - Bleachers
  3. "Little Fang" - Avey Tare's Slasher Flicks
  4. "The Lord's Favorite" - Iceage
  5. "War On the East Coast" - The New Pornographers
  6. "Do You" - Spoon
  7. "New Calm Pt. 2" - Ought
  8. "NEW DORP. NEW YORK" - SBTRKT ft. Ezra Koenig
  9. "Winter" - TV On The Radio
  10. "Never Catch Me" - Flying Lotus ft. Kendrick Lamar
  11. "Mr Noah" - Panda Bear
  12. "Content Nausea" - Parquet Courts
  13. "Birth In Reverse" - St. Vincent
  14. "Twelve Feet Deep" - The Front Bottoms
  15. "Parade" - The Antlers
  16. "Disco//Very" - Warpaint
  17. "Salad Days" - Mac DeMarco
  18. "Every Other Freckle" - Alt-J
  19. "Art School" - Frankie Cosmos
  20. "How Can You Really" - Foxygen
  21. "Shelter Song" - Temples
  22. "Are You What You Want To Be?" - Foster The People
  23. "Who Needs You" - The Orwells
  24. "Water Fountain" - tUnE-yArDs
  25. "They Dated Steadily" - Mink Mussel Creek
  26. "Happy Idiot" - TV On The Radio
  27. "Lazaretto" - Jack White
  28. "The Great Unknown" - Jukebox the Ghost
  29. "2 is 8" - Lone
  30. "Flesh War" - Total Control

Greg Dubin's Top Albums

  1. Literature - Chorus
  2. Run the Jewels - Run the Jewels 2
  3. The Menzingers - Rented World
  4. Pete Cannon & Dr. Syntax - Killer Combo!
  5. Andrew Jackson Jihad - Christmas Island
  6. Fishboy - An Elephant
  7. Kitty - Impatiens
  8. Vanilla - Sweet Talk
  9. Rustie - Green Language
  10. Backtrack - Lost in Life

Greg Dubin's Top Tracks

  1. Rustie feat. Danny Brown – "Attak"
  2. Run the Jewels – "Oh My Darling Don't Cry"
  3. Jam Baxter – "Leash"
  4. The Menzingers – "Transient Love"
  5. Fishboy – "I'm a Ghost"
  6. Pete Cannon & Dr. Syntax feat. Jman & Eva Lazarus – "Weed and Ale"
  7. Andrew Jackson Jihad – "Deathlessness"
  8. ScHoolBoy Q feat. Kendrick Lamar – "Collard Greens"
  9. Half Life (Distance and Riz MC) – "Subtle"
  10. Joey Bada$$ - "Christ Conscious"
  11. Literature – "New Jacket"
  12. Kitty - "Marijuana"
  13. Backtrack – "Lost in Life"
  14. Vanilla – "Sweet Talk"
  15. Vic Mensa – "Feel That"

Flannery Rollins' Top Albums

  • Alex G - DSU
  • Gerard Way - Hesitant Alien
  • Flying Lotus - You're Dead!
  • Mac Demarco - Salad Days
  • Joyce Manor - Never Hungover Again
  • The Hotelier - Home, Like Noplace Is There
  • Frankie Cosmos - Zentropy
  • Cyberbully Mom Club - Outdoor Activities

Mason Lynaugh's Top Albums

  1. YG - My Krazy Life
  2. I Love Makonnen - I Love Makonnen EP
  3. Dowrong and Eric Dingus - The Dowrong EP
  4. Run the Jewels - RTJ2
  5. Vince Staples - Hell Can Wait
  6. Rich Gang - Tha Tour Pt. 1
  7. Travi$ - Days Before Rodeo
  8. Ratking - So It Goes
  9. Freddie Gibbs and Madlib - Piñata
  10. Sir Michael Rocks - Banco

Honorable mentions:

  • Various Artists - The Guardians of the Galaxy Soundtrack
  • Father - Young Hot Ebony
